channel.title: CVE Feed for BetterAddons -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BetterAddons -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-34432|2024-05-09T11:06:52.732Z -- BetterAddons -- Better Elementor Addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BetterAddons Better Elementor Addons better-elementor-addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Better Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.4.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-30423|2024-03-29T13:11:06.929Z -- BetterAddons -- Better Elementor Addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BetterAddons Better Elementor Addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Better Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.3.7.
